name: Who Stole My Grapes?
description:
You stole the king's grapes. That was not very nice of you. And so he CAST you AWAY (hehe get it) to the Grape Island where you will need to grow grapes.

Controls: 

  • E - select, water, collect, enter shop, buy item in shop
  • ESC - leave shop, quit game
  • arrows - move
